Text: All the Downloaders Plzz Dont Download This Movie..Not Bcoz of the problem of the uploaded print or anything of that sort...The reason is that It's the worst movie I hav ever seen and laletan hav done in his life..I saw this fucking movie frm theatre...Dont watch this movieee..

this is a dub of an oscar won english movie named the  rain man....but that movie is so awesome than this ..but not bad for a one time watch..mohan lan hasnt acted so well here compared to the guy who acted in english..(Dustin Hoffman)
